title: Anniversary Package
seo_title: Anniversary Package | Wine Country Inn & Cottages
seo_description: Rekindle that special marriage moment with a stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages.
short_description:
Rekindle that special Anniversary with a stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages. Enjoy the moment with a chilled split of sparkling wine in any selected room plus local chocolates. Of course, complimentary Wine Country breakfast is included every morning, and on Friday and Saturday evenings our guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting served in the Winery House, hosted by a local vintner.

Package Includes:

  • Chilled split of sparkling wine in your room upon arrival
  • Small box of chocolates from a local chocolatier Woodhouse Chocolates
  • Wine Country Breakfast each morning
  • Weekend Wine Tasting served in the Winery House hosted by a local vintner
long_description:
Rekindle that special marriage moment with a stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages. Enjoy the moment with a chilled split of sparkling wine in any selected room plus local chocolates. Of course, complimentary Wine Country breakfast is included every morning, and on Friday and Saturday evenings our guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting served in the Winery House, hosted by a local vintner.

Package Includes:

  • Chilled split of sparkling wine in your room upon arrival
  • Small box of chocolates from a local chocolatier Woodhouse Chocolates
  • Wine Country Breakfast each morning
  • Weekend Wine Tasting served in the Winery House hosted by a local vintner

Reserve any night, select the desired room type, and add on the Anniversary Package option. Or call the hotel directly at (888) 465-4608 for assistance with adding this package to your reservation!
